questions.question: What consensus mechanism does the Chiliz Chain use?
questions.fun_fact: Chiliz Chain utilizes the Proof of Staked Authority (PoSA) consensus mechanism, blending the best of PoA for efficiency and PoS for decentralization.

questions.question: What unique digital assets are pioneered by Socios.com using the Chiliz blockchain technology?
questions.fun_fact: Fan Tokens are a groundbreaking digital asset class that enhance fan experiences, offering a new way for fans to engage with their favorite teams.

questions.question: What major upgrade did Chiliz implement to expand its ecosystem?
